00028 #ifndef __ALL_PASS_FILTER_CPP

00041 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00042 
00043 AllPassFilter::AllPassFilter(float gain, long delay)
00044 {
00045         // set parameters
00046         g = gain;
00047         g_sqrd = g*g;
00048         D = delay;
00049 
00050 
00051         // initialize x_hist queue and y_hist queue
00052         x_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(D);
00053         for(long i=0; i<D; i++)
00054                 x_hist->enqueue(0.0);
00055 
00056         y_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(D);
00057         for(long j=0; j<D; j++)
00058                 y_hist->enqueue(0.0);
00059 }
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00061 
00062 AllPassFilter::~AllPassFilter()
00063 {
00064         delete y_hist;
00065         delete x_hist;
00066 }
00067 
00068 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00069 
00070 m_sample_type AllPassFilter::do_filter(m_sample_type x_t)
00071 {
00072         m_sample_type y_t;
00073         
00074         y_t=-g*x_t + (1-g_sqrd)*(x_hist->dequeue() + g*y_hist->dequeue()); 
00075         x_hist->enqueue(x_t);
00076         y_hist->enqueue(y_t);
00077         return y_t;
00078 }
00079 
00080 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------//
00081 
00082 void AllPassFilter::reset()
00083 {
00084         delete y_hist;
00085         delete x_hist;
00086 
00087 
00088         // initialize x_hist queue and y_hist queue
00089         x_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(D);
00090         for(long i=0; i<D; i++)
00091                 x_hist->enqueue(0.0);
00092   
00093         y_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(D);
00094         for(long j=0; j<D; j++)
00095                 y_hist->enqueue(0.0);       
00096 }
00097

00100 void AllPassFilter::xml_print( ofstream& xmlOutput )
00101 {
00102 
00103         xmlOutput << "\t<AllPassFilter>" << endl;
00104         xmlOutput << "\t\t<g value=\"" << g << "\" />" << endl;
00105         //cout << "\t\t<g_sqrd value=\"" << g_sqrd << "\" />" << endl;
00106         xmlOutput << "\t\t<D value=\"" << D << "\" />" << endl;
00107         xmlOutput << "\t</AllPassFilter>" << endl;
00108 
00109 }

00114 }
00115 
00116 void AllPassFilter::set_g(float gain)
00117 {
00118         g = gain;
00119         g_sqrd = g*g;
00120 }
00121 void AllPassFilter::set_D(long delay)
00122 {
00123         D = delay;
00124 
00125         // initialize x_hist queue and y_hist queue
00126         x_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(D);
00127         for(long i=0; i<D; i++)
00128                 x_hist->enqueue(0.0);
00129         
00130         y_hist = new Filter::hist_queue<m_sample_type>(D);
00131         for(long j=0; j<D; j++)
00132                 y_hist->enqueue(0.0);         
00133 
00134 }
00135 
00136 void AllPassFilter::xml_read(XmlReader::xmltag *apftag)
00137 {
00138         char *value;
00139         if(value=apftag->findChildParamValue("g","value"))
00140         {
00141                 set_g(atof(value));
00142         }
00143         
00144         if(value=apftag->findChildParamValue("D","value"))
00145         {
00146                 set_D(atoi(value));
00147         }
00148 }
